EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in August 2014
EmailTemplate.name: Early Withdrawal Notice Autumn Term 2014
EmailTemplate.subject: Early Withdrawal Notice Autumn Term 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,
In case you are planning to withdraw your child(ren) at the end of the Autumn term (19th December, 2014), please be informed of the deadline for submission of the withdrawal notice, in order to receive reimbursement of the Development Contribution fee or an Early notice payback.
Please inform the Admissions department about your intentions by email no later than 1st October, 2014. Once we receive your email, we will then send you an online Withdrawal Form for you to complete, which we will receive automatically once its submitted.
If we do not receive your email by 1st October, 2014 your request will unfortunately be outside of the reimbursement time frame.
Please contact us should you have any questions in this regard.
Kind regards,
Admissions Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
